column5: Thought I would try a new fish batter. I found Gerritts Batter recipe but noticed that there is something missing with the Corn Starch amount. The recipe states "1/4 Corn Starch". Is it 1/4 CUP or what? Thanks for the help. I am anxious to give it a try.  Regards, Snowball

LOL... thank you for wanting to give it a try! Alot of guys use it now, let just hope the guys I am fishing with this weekend actually catch some fish!..  it is 1/4 cup  Good luck and enjoy!  Gerritt.
KAELA ROX!!!!! <--- sorry guys she BEGGED me!!
